text: India, officially the Republic of India is a country in South Asia, consisting of 28 states and eight union territories. All Indian states and some of the union territories have their own elected government and the union territories come under the jurisdiction of the Central Government. India has its own national symbols. Apart from the national symbols, the states and union territories have adopted their own seals and symbols including dances listed below. == States == List of Indian state dances State Common name Binomial name Image IUCN category Andhra Pradesh Kuchipudi Kuchipudi Arunachal Pradesh Aji Lamu Aji Lamu Assam Bihu Dance Bihu Dance Bihar Jhumar Dance Jhumar Dance Chhattisgarh Cherchera Dance Cherchera Dance Goa Dhalo Dance Dhalo Dance Gujarat Garba Garba Haryana Phag dance (Ragni state dance) Phag Dance Himachal Pradesh Dev Nati Dev Nati Jharkhand Chhau Dance Jhumair/Chhau Dance Karnataka Dollu Kunitha Dollu Kunitha Kerala Kathakali Kathakali Madhya Pradesh Raai dance Raai Maharashtra Lavani dance Lavani Dance Manipur Lai Haraoba Lai Haraoba Meghalaya Chipiah Dance Chipiah Dance Mizoram Cheraw (dance) Cheraw Dance Nagaland Changmai Dance Chang Lo/Changmai Dance Odisha Odissi Dance Odissi Dance Punjab Bhangra Bhangra Rajasthan Ghoomar Indian Rajput dance Sikkim Chukey Dance Chukey Dance Tamil Nadu Bharatanatyam Bharatanatyam Dance Telangana Perini Sivatandavam Perini Åšivathandavam or Perini Thandavam Tripura Hojagiri Hojagiri Dance Uttar Pradesh Kathak Kathak/Indian Dance Uttarakhand Choliya dance Choliya dance West Bengal Kirtan dance Kirtan dance == Union territories == List of Indian state dances (Union territories) Union territory Common name Binomial name Image IUCN category Andaman and Nicobar Islands Chandigarh Delhi Lakshadweep Puducherry ==References== State Dances Indian state dances State Dances Dances Dances
